inclusion.criterion: Sample size for pilot study are used.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: healthy in general, male and aged 18 to 60 years old.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of blood or coagulation disorder
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: currently active smoker or already stopped less than 1 month
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has sickle cell disease and is experiencing severe bone pain. They have a history of positive sickle cell crises since childhood.
